text: In a chat with THR, the CW star previews the remaining episodes of the season, promising ` ` big productions'' until the finale. The Originals is diving into the origins of Klaus and Marcel's relationship. In Tuesday's episode, ` ` A Closer Walk With Thee,'' Klaus is forced to revisit his path with Marcel, his former protege and adoptive son, amid regular nightmares of his father Mikael.
